body: I am getting an error, something about old version. Thanks!

comment_data.body: thanks. not working for registration :(
did you use yowsup?
No. No idea how to use it. Can you give me a dummy guide on how to set it up?

read this
https://github.com/venomous0x/WhatsAPI/issues/238

you need to install Python 2.6 or 2.7
Thanks! I will try that :D

Hi shirioko,
i encountered the following error, can you tell me what I did that went wrong? ->

root@ubuntu:/var/www/yowsup/src# python ./yowsup-cli -c config.example -d --requestcode voice
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./yowsup-cli", line 33, in <module>
    from Examples.CmdClient import WhatsappCmdClient
  File "/var/www/yowsup/src/Examples/CmdClient.py", line 21, in <module>
    from Yowsup.connectionmanager import YowsupConnectionManager
  File "/var/www/yowsup/src/Yowsup/connectionmanager.py", line 28, in <module>
    from Common.watime import WATime
  File "/var/www/yowsup/src/Yowsup/Common/watime.py", line 23, in <module>
    from dateutil import tz
ImportError: No module named dateutil

You need to install dateutil module.
I'm not going to explain how. Google it.
It works. Thanks!
@ruriimasu : man can you tell me how to install dateutil... I am getting same error. I searched google but not getting exactly how to install dateutil
here http://pypi.python.org/pypi/setuptools
@shirioko : thanks... I run ez_setup.py and it installed something. but I am getting same error... plz help
http://labix.org/python-dateutil#head-2f49784d6b27bae60cde1cff6a535663cf87497b
ok I downloaded the file and now shud I move all the files in "python-dateutil-1.5" into c:/Python27 ?
This is an issue tracker and not a tutorial forum. If you can't figure out how to install a simple module I doubt you'll be able to use the API.
man Please... I know how to use API... please help me to install this dateutil. I am new to python... I know only PHP
Download python-dateutil-1.5.tar.gz, extract it and run "python setup.py"

I ran it and got this error:
what command to give?

![1](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2361378/71990/dadd0c08-5ffe-11e2-8164-b515946d3697.jpg)
stfu . if you are not able to get this workin maybe you are not supposed to do wa-spamming.

I installed dateutil with following command

python setup.py install

now when i run  python ./yowsup-cli -c config.example -d --requestcode sms

I get error "config file is invalid"

my config.example is as below

cc= #if not specified it will be autodetected
phone= My Mobile number without country code
d=
password=

please help guys

muslimsg

Can't offer you any help as I installed it in a linux box with no clue how to use python or php. I only followed instructions and was lucky to have been successful so far.
phone number requires country code though.

@ruriimasu : so in config.example I have to write following?

cc= #if not specified it will be autodetected
phone= My Mobile number WITH country code
d=
password=
No your country code should go in cc

my config.example I have the following:

cc= COUNTRY CODE
phone= MY MOBILE NUMBER
d=
password=

I did this about still getting message config file invalid...

can anyone send me correct config file so that I can just change the values... Guys I am just one step away...
Why are people still asking questions about python? Go over to yowsup project page and ask there instead.

title: Whats the latest whatsappver?
